Indeed its natural phenomenon that if we move ahead with the concept of make in india then the indain economy will definitely rise.Most of the products that being used in india are imported from other countries.The rise in US dollar have made drastic change and defeated from the brazallian to indian currencies.Recently came in the news that FDI has taken an initiation steps to do the prolifiration of its bussiness.People aslo were aware of the facts that what could be happened if it starts its bussiness here.Nothing but the small scale industries in india would be highly affected.The core reason behind is that the procucts sold by the wallmarts are cheaper as compared to the other indian domestic manufacturers.

Its is very important that we indian citizens should think about the products i.e made in india and should always be faithful to the concept of make in india because only making of indian products can keep growth to indian economy.I am completely agree with this concept and also have seen the impact in the recent and present year.Domestic products in india have to be given a positive response and the large and small scale industries should be given a positive jack from the government .This will not only help in the deveoplment of average indian citizen but also to the development of the nation.
